CustomField.formula:
AND( Tzedakah_Circle__c = false, Lapsed_Recurring_Donor__c = false, ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.Current_Ladder__c )), Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HH_Account', ISPICKVAL( Account.Donor_Level__c , 'No Designation'),
OR( Number_of_Gifts_This_Year__c >= 1 && Number_of_Gifts_Last_Year__c >= 1, Number_of_Gifts_Last_Year__c >= 1 && Number_of_Gifts_Two_Years_Ago__c >=1, Number_of_Gifts_This_Year__c >= 2, Number_of_Gifts_Last_Year__c >= 2, Number_of_Gifts_Two_Years_Ago__c >= 2) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: under 1K people who have given 2+ gifts in a year for this year, last year, or the year before, or have given two consecutive fiscal years in that period, but are not already Tzedakah Circle or lapsed recurring donors
CustomField.label: Tzedakah Circle Prospect
